title: PCOS Awareness Workshop
description: Join us for an educational workshop about PCOS symptoms, management strategies, and the latest research findings.

title: Spring Fundraiser
description: Our annual fundraising event to support PCOS research and community programs. Dinner, silent auction, and guest speakers.

title: Support Group Meeting
description: Monthly support group for individuals with PCOS. Share experiences, ask questions, and connect with others.

title: Research Symposium
description: A day-long symposium featuring presentations from leading PCOS researchers and healthcare professionals.
